author: wmtan
body: Due to ROOT5/ROOT6 differences, a carry forward from CMSSW_7_5_X broke FWLite in CMSSW_7_5_ROOT5_X.  Pull request #9902 fixed this partially, but the fix was incomplete. This PR completes the fix of FWLite, so the unit tests no longer fail.
title: Account for ROOT5/ROOT6 differences in FWLite
